Robert J. Collier: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Elie Wiesel: Just as man cannot live without dreams, he cannot live without hope. If dreams reflect the past, hope summons the future.
Frank Zappa: Art is making something out of nothing and selling it.
Anatole France: If the path be beautiful, let us not ask where it leads.
Elbert Hubbard: Life in abundance comes only through great love.
Garyvee: Excuses are the currency that allow you to not act.
Albert Einstein: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
